roleset.name: having much weight

role.descr: specific substance (may be abstract) weighing arg1 down

example.name: arg1
example.text: The lively , hustling and bustling 2012 Taiwan " General Election " has already dropped the curtain . As Ma Ying - jeou said in his victory acceptance speech , " It is enough for us to rejoice for one night , and we need to be as as we were four years ago , for we still have a lot of work to do " . Yes , the future is a long ways away , the road ahead is very long , and the responsibility is heavy .

example.name: both args
example.text: The air was heavy with unspoken knowledge .

example.name: heaviness-n
example.amr: (d / deny-01 :ARG0 (p / patient-yy) :ARG1 (h / heavy-01 :ARG1 (a / anatomical-site :name (n / name :op1 "chest") :part-of p)))

roleset.note: HEAVILY-R and HEAVINESS-N NOTES: Added by Kristin based on THYME.
HEAVY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from heavy.01-j)
